title: ☑️ Ensure Deployment has more than one replica configured
description: When you run two or more replicas per service, you are increasing the availability of the containerized service because you are not relying on a single pod to do all of the work. Furthermore, scaling horizontally by adding pods allows your service to scale and handle larger loads.
